text: imi gyeolhonhan yeoseong-gwado geumji doena neohuideul-ui oleunson-i soyuhan geos-eun je-oela igeos-eun hananim-ui myeong lyeong-imyeo i oeeneun neohuileul wihae heolag-i doeeoss-eumyeo gan-eum-i anin habbeob jeog gyeolhon-eul wonhal gyeong-u jichamgeum-eul ji bulhaeya doenani neohuiga geudeulgwa gyeol honham-eulosseo yogmang-eul chuguhaessdamyeon geu nyeodeul-ege jichamgeum-eul jul geos-ila geu uimuga haenghaejin hueneun ssangbang-ui hab uie uihan geos-e gwanhayeoneun neohuie ge joeag-i anigeoneul sillo hananim eun mansahyeongtong hasim-ila
